title: Provisionals tomorrow add me to start a fresh ranked climb
body: Aye I’ll be ranked tomorrow and doing provisionals first up, so I’m lookin for an adc to duo with or a whole fkn team for the day ahaha! Fuck I dunno but I wanna get a good ranked start, and maybe make a team who knows!

replies.body:
I have checked your stat man; I'd advice you to not start rank. Get some more practice in norm.

But if you do play rank, i would place my bet on bronze 3-4 when you end placement, lol.

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=+x+Kunta+Kinte+x

Your luck wont last long. Check the contribution in stat page. You got carried every game you've won. I wouldnt celebrate too early, you are just surving on luck of your team mate carrying.
